```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
pacman::p_load(
  tidyverse,
  readxl,
  dplyr,
  sparklyr,
  ggplot2,
  plotly,
  DT,
  scales,
  arrow,
  crosstalk,
  shiny,
  htmltools,
  echarts4r,
  kableExtra,
  base64enc,
  knitr
)

source("functions_sr.R",local = TRUE)

cc_data <- join_gestions(dir)
cantidad <- reparto(cc_data,filter_clase = "Tipo de Renta", 
                     filter_tipo_reparto = c("Titular","Derechohabiente"),
                     filter_bd = "Cantidad", type_resp = "n_beneficiarios")
monto <- reparto(cc_data,filter_clase = "Tipo de Renta", 
                     filter_tipo_reparto = c("Titular","Derechohabiente"),
                     filter_bd = "Monto", type_resp = "m_beneficiarios")
cantMont <- cant_mont(cantidad$bar,monto$bar)
genero <- reparto(cc_data,filter_tipo = c("Titular","Derechohabiente"), 
                     filter_tipo_reparto = c("Masculino","Femenino"),
                     filter_bd = "Cantidad", type_resp = "sn_beneficiarios")
departamento <- reparto(cc_data,filter_clase = "Departamento_Regional", 
                     filter_bd = "Cantidad", type_resp = "dn_beneficiarios", month = cantidad$pie$MES[1])
regular <- reparto(cc_data,filter_bd = c("Cantidad","Monto"), 
                     filter_tipo = "Regular", type_resp = "pagos_beneficiarios")
domicilio <- reparto(cc_data,filter_bd = c("Cantidad","Monto"), 
                     filter_tipo = "Pago a Domicilio", type_resp = "pagos_beneficiarios")
abono <- reparto(cc_data,filter_bd = c("Cantidad","Monto"), 
                     filter_tipo = "Abono a Cuenta", type_resp = "pagos_beneficiarios")
poder <- reparto(cc_data,filter_bd = c("Cantidad","Monto"), 
                     filter_tipo = "Pago con Poder", type_resp = "pagos_beneficiarios")
anexo <- reparto(cc_data,filter_bd = "Estadistica", 
                     filter_tipo = c("IMPEDIMENTO","HOSPITALIZACIÓN","FALLECIMIENTO") , type_resp = "anexo")

knitr::include_graphics("images/bg.jpeg")
img_path <- "images/bg.jpeg"  # Ruta de tu imagen
img_base64 <- base64enc::base64encode(img_path)

graf_img <- function(graf){
  div(
  style = sprintf(
    "display: flex; 
    justify-content: center; 
    align-items: center; 
    background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,%s'); 
    background-size: cover; 
    background-repeat: no-repeat; 
    background-position: center; 
    height: 100%%; 
    width: 100%%; 
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 0; 
    margin: 0;",
    img_base64
  ),
  p(
    style = "padding: 0 5px; margin: 0;",
    graf
    )
)
}

```
